data.eml:eml: New species and new records of Tingidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera) from Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guilbert, Eric (2015): New species and new records of Tingidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera) from Vietnam. Zootaxa 3956 (4): 531-546, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3956.4.5
